How to make your Markdown code-snippets editable and executable?

Our solution, just attach a script-tag to it that defines how the input or inputs should be evaluated...

{{< youtube -VrEtZvhn6I >}}

You can use this this example as a basis for your own course by following this [link](https://liascript.github.io/LiveEditor/?)

... Or experiment with it in the LiveEditor below:

<iframe class="liveeditor" src="https://liascript.github.io/LiveEditor/?"></iframe>
